name: Gun Game (TheRepeat)
description:
Welcome to Gun* Game, my entry for the SRPG Studio "Don't Make Fire Emblem" game jam, in which we made games that are less Fire Emblemy than usual.

If you're a fan of shooters, you probably already get the idea of this game from the title: get a kill with a weapon to advance to the next weapon, and do that with every weapon to win. This game translates that classic shooter mode into a brief, but challenging sword-and-sorcery strategy game!

(*No actual guns included.)
